WelcomeToFever

A tabletop roleplaying game where you explore the double-sided town of Fever, Colorado.

View the Project on GitHub catnipped/WelcomeToFever

The Session — What you need to know before you play

The World of Fever

Materials

All you really need to play is the following:

  • This book
  • 1 character sheet per player (see below)
  • 1 pencil per player
  • 1 20-sided die per player
  • Some tokens or counters
